channel.title: Need help with sprites for items
channel.description:
whats up guys i need help with item sprites, im try to add the blue legendary plate legs and chainmail that matt had on projectp2p. i got the picturemask right. and invi pic is right. but when i wield the item, it should be the color of blue mask but instead its iron plate legs lol. any 1 got the sprites i need for itemwieldabledef.xml? for legendary chainmail and plate legs
if so would be very much so appreciated

haha c’mon punch me bitch,i’ll rape you befor you have a chance [just to get gim mad haha]

good job on digging this up, tell me are you so lonely in your life?

item.source: Need help with sprites for items

item.title: Need help with sprites for items
item.dc:creator: @xx_c1ph3r_xx xx c1ph3r xx
item.description:
@xx_c1ph3r_xx wrote:

did you even edit an animation at all?

extract from your client/conf folder animations.rscd -> animations.xml

edit an animation or add a new one

find the id of the new one or the one you edited

example id1 = first animationdef in the list

repack it into animations.rscd when done

put the id of the animation in for sprite in itemwieldable.xml and your done.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 14, 2009, 08:41:38 pm[/size][hr]but remember, you must repack itemwieldable into the .gz when you are done.

Read full topic
